src: “Sweswi hi ni makondlo ya tin’hweti ta 4 lawa ma nga riki na vuvabyi bya chukela kambe eku sunguleni a ma ri ni vuvabyi bya chukela,” u tlhandlekerile.
mt: 4 out of 5 people have been vaccinated against polio, but some have not.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dok. Ehud Ur, phurofesa wa vutshunguri eYunivhesiti ya Dalhousie eHalifax, Nova Scotia tlhelo mutshamaxitulu wa xiyenge xa tlilinikhali na sayense eka Canadian Diabetes Association u lemukise leswaku ndzavisiso wa ha ri emasungulweni.
mt: Dr. Edmond Ryan, a professor of medicine and biochemistry at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, was awarded the Canadian Diabetes Association's 2008 Banting Memorial Award for his research into the causes of diabetes.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Ku fana ni vativi van’wana, a nga tiyiseki kahle leswaku vuvabyi bya chukela byi nga tshunguleka, u vula leswaku leswi kumiweke a swi va khumbi vanhu lava va nga ni vuvabyi bya chukela bya Type 1.
mt: 2 people were killed, but the death toll could have been higher if the victims had not been wearing seatbelts, officials say.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Hi Musumbhunuku, Sara Danius, matsalana wa nkarhi hinkwawo wa Komiti ya Nobel eka Matsalwa le Swedish Academy, u tivise erivaleni eka nongonoko wa xiyanimoya eka Sveriges Radio le Sweden a vula leswaku komiti, tanihi leswi a yi nga swi koti ku fikelela Bob Dylan hi ku kongoma malunghana ni ku hlula kakwe Sagwadi ra Nobel eka Matsalwa hi 2016, yi tshikile matshalatshala lawa a yi ma endla yo n’wi kuma.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, told Swedish Radio that the committee, as it had not yet decided to award Bob Dylan the Nobel Prize in Literature in 2016, had not yet decided to award him the prize.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius u te, “Sweswi a hi endli nchumu. Ndzi be riqingho ni ku rhumela tiimeyili eka mupfuni wakwe la nga ekusuhi naswona ndzi kume tinhlamulo ta kahle. Sweswi, sweswo swi ringene hakunene.”
mt: “I’m not going to comment on the situation. I’m just going to say that I’m very sorry for the loss of his life and I’m going to give him a proper burial. I’m going to do the best I can.”
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Enkarhini lowu hundzeke, CEO ya Ring, Jamie Siminoff, u vule leswaku khampani yi sungule enkarhini lowu bele rakwe ra le nyangweni a ri nga twali kahle loko a ri exitolo lexi a xi ri agarajini yakwe.
mt: In a statement, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company was working to fix the issue, which was not affecting all users.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: U ri, u endle bele ra le nyangweni ra WiFi.
mt: 1. It is, it is a WiFi hotspot.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff u vule leswaku minxavo yi tlakukile hi 2013 endzhaku ka loko a humelerile eka nongonoko wa Shark Tank laha vafambisi va nongonoko va aleke ku hakelela masungulo ya kona.
mt: 2013, Siminoff said he was inspired by the Shark Tank reality show, where entrepreneurs pitch their ideas to a panel of investors.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Eku heleni ka 2017, Siminoff u humelerile eka chanele ya thelevhixini yo xava ya QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff was hired by the home shopping network QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring yi tlhele yi lulamisa nandzu lowu a wu khumba khampani ya vusirheleri leyi a yi phikizana na yona, ku nga ADT Corporation.
mt: The company, which is known as ADT, said it was not aware of the problem.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Hambileswi ntlhavelo wa nsawutiso wun’we wa ndzingeto wu tikombaka wu swi kota ku hunguta mafu lama vangiwaka hi Ebola, ku fikela sweswi, ku hava swidzidzirisi leswi swi koteke kahle ku tshungula ntluleto lowu nga kona.
mt: 1,000 people have been quarantined in the country, with 4 confirmed cases of Ebola.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Mpfangano wun’wana wo lwisana ni xitsongwatsongwana, ZMapp, eku sunguleni a wu tshembisa emhakeni leyi, kambe tidyondzo ta ximfumo ti kombise leswaku a wu nga vuyerisi swinene hilaha a swi languteriwa hakona eku siveleni rifu.
mt: 1 of 2 experimental treatments, ZMapp, has been used in a handful of patients, but the drug's maker says it's too early to tell if it's helping.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Eka ndzingeto wa PALM, ZMapp wu tiaka leswaku van’wasayense va wu tirhise tanihi masungula ivi va wu ringanisa ni vutshunguri lebyin’wana byinharhu.
mt: At the PALM conference, ZMapp was reported to have been used as a treatment in two Ebola patients, with one surviving.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics yi seketela papila ra United States Olympic Committee ni ku amukela xilaveko lexikulu xa leswaku ndyangu wa Olympic wu hlohlotela mbango lowu sirhelelekeke eka vatlangi lavan’wana hinkwavo.
mt: USA Gymnastics has been suspended by the United States Olympic Committee for failing to protect its athletes from sexual abuse.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Hi pfumelelana ni marito ya USOC ya leswaku leswi pfunaka vatlangi ni swipano swa hina, ni mitlangu ya vona, swi nga vuyeriwa ku antswa hi ku endla ku cinca lokunene eka nhlangano wa hina, ematshan’weni yo teka timfanelo.
mt: The USOC said in a statement that the athletes and coaches were not involved in the incident, and that the organization was not aware of any other incidents at the camp, which is being held at the Olympic Training Center in Colorado Springs.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics yi seketela vulavisisi lebyi tiyimeleke lebyi nga ha paluxaka ndlela leyi ku tirhisiwa ko biha ka xiyenge lexi hlamuseriwaka hi xivindzi hi lava poneke eka Larry Nassar leswi vangeke ku honisiwa ka swona nkarhi wo leha ni ku amukela ku cinca kwihi ni kwihi loku lavekaka ni loku faneleke.
mt: USA Gymnastics announced the hiring of a new chief executive officer, Beth Harris, who will oversee the organization's response to the sexual abuse scandal involving former team doctor Larry Nassar.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics na USOC ti na pakani leyi fanaka — ku endla ntlangu wa ti-gymnastic, ni yin’wana, yi hlayiseka hilaha swi nga kotekaka hakona eka vatlangi leswaku va landzela milorho ya vona eka mbango lowu hlayisekeke, lowunene ni lowu va nyikaka matimba.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have agreed to a new policy — to ban the use of the ti-gymnastic, that is, the use of the word “gymnastics” in the name of a gymnast, unless it is used in a way that does not imply that the gymnast is a professional.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Emalembeni ya va-1960, Brzezinski u tirhele John F. Kennedy tanihi mutsundzuxi wakwe ivi a tirhela vufambisi bya Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski advised John F. Kennedy as his national security advisor, and later Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Enkarhini wa nhlawulo wa 1976 u tsundzuxe Carter hi ta pholisi ya matikomambe, ivi a tirha tanihi National Security Advisor (NSA) ku sukela hi 1977 ku ya ka 1981, a tlhandlama Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 Nobel Peace Prize winner Carter served as President Jimmy Carter’s National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, replacing Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Tanihi NSA, u pfune Carter eku tameleni timhaka misava hi vutswatsi, tanihi Camp David Accords, 1978; a hlela vuxaka exikarhi ka US–China emalembeni ya le ku heleni ka va-1970; Hundzuluko wa Iran, loyi vangeke hasahasa ya mpfalelo wa Iran, hi 1979; swin’we ni ku hlasela ka Soviet le Afghanistan, hi 1979.
mt: 1978: Carter signs the Panama Canal Treaty, ending US control of the canal; Camp David Accords, 1978; US-China relations normalized after the 1970s; Iranian Revolution, which overthrew the Shah of Iran, in 1979; Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Filimi, leyi a yi kombisa Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone, yi langiwile eka swiyengekulu hinkwaswo.
mt: 2016’s La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, won six awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling na Stone va langiwile eka Mutlangi wo Famba Emahlweni havumbirhi.
mt: Gosling and Stone were killed in a car accident.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Ku langiwa kun’wana ku katsa Xifaniso Lexi Fambaka Emahlweni, Mukongomisi, Sinemathogirafi, Vumaki Bya Swiambalo, ku Sasela Filimi, Nkutlunya wo Sungula, Vumaki bya Vuhumelerisi, ku Sasela Mpfumawulo, ku Pfanganisa Mpfumawulo ni ku Tlanga Exikirinini ko Sungula.
mt: 1. The Constitution, 2. The President, 3. The Prime Minister, 4. The Cabinet, 5. The Parliament, 6. The Judiciary, 7. The Legislature, 8. The Executive, 9. The Legislature, 10. The Executive.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Tinsimu timbirhi eka fililmi, Odixini (The Fools Who Dream) na Dorobakulu of Stars, ti langiwile eka risimu ro sungula ro famba emahlweni. Xitudiyo xa Lionsgate xi langiwile ka 26 — ku tlula xitudiyo xihi ni xihi xin’wana.
mt: 2016 Oscar nominees for Best Original Song, “Writing’s on the Wall” from James Bond film Spectre and “City of Stars” from La La Land, were announced on Monday. Lionsgate announced the release of the film on November 25.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Loko siku ra Sonto ri ya eku heleni, Muungameri wa United States Donald Trump, eka mbulavulo lowu a wu rhuleke hi ku tirhisa matsalana wa ta mahungu, u tivisa leswaku masocha ya US a ma ta suka le Syria.
mt: On Sunday, United States President Donald Trump, in a tweet, announced the withdrawal of US troops from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Xitiviso lexi xi endliwile endzhaku ka loko Trump a burisane hi riqingho na Muungameri wa le Turkey ku nga Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The statement was issued after Trump spoke with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkey a ri ta tlhela ri rindza vabohiwa lava lwelaka ISIS lava, hi ku vula ka mbulavulo, matiko ya Yuropa ma aleke ku va tlherisela ka rikwavo.
mt: Turkey has been accused of supporting ISIS militants, according to reports, European countries have been calling for sanctions.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Leswi swi tiyisisa leswaku tidinasora tin’wana a ti ri ni tinsiva, ku nga mhaka leyi se yi hangalakeke, kambe swi tlhela swi nyika vuxokoxoko bya leswaku swivumbiwa leswi se swi feke, a swi nga swi koti ku humesa muvala ni nhlelo wa xivononharhu.
mt: It is important to note that the accident was not caused by a lack of training, but rather by a failure to follow proper procedures, which led to the crash and the loss of life.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Van’wasayense va vula leswaku tinsiva ta xiharhi lexi a ti ri ta buraweni wa ribungwana ehenhla kasi ehansi a ti kwalarile kumbe ti ri ta muvala wa xitshopana.
mt: The aircraft was reported to have been on a training mission when it crashed.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Leswi kumiweke swi tlhela swi nyika vutivi hi ta hundzuluko wa tinsiva ta tinyenyana.
mt: 10 people were injured in the crash.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Hikwalaho ka leswi tinsiva ta tidinasora ti nga dzikangiki hi ku kula, leswi vuriwaka rachisi, kambe ti ni swihlawulekisi swin’wana swa tinsiva — mahakatimba ni swihako — valavisisi va vule leswaku tirachisi swi nga endleka a ku ri nhluvukiso lowu teke endzhaku ka nkarhi wa hundzuluko eka tinsiva letin’wana.
mt: 2010 was a year of unprecedented change, but it was also a year of continuity — the economy, the deficit, the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan — that the president inherited from his predecessor.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Xivumbeko xa tinsiva xi ringanyeta leswaku a ti nga tirhiseriwa ku haha kambe a ti pfuna ku lawula mahiselo kumbe ku bomba ha tona. Valavisisi va ringanyeta leswaku, hambileswi ku nga ncila wa dinasora leyitsongo, xikombiso xi kombisa tinsiva ta leyikulu ku nga ri ta leyitsongo.
mt: The suspect was not arrested, but was questioned about his actions. Police say, however, that the incident was not terrorism-related, but a prank.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Valavisisi va ringanyete leswaku, hambileswi ku nga ncila wa dinasora leyitsongo, xikombiso xi kombisa tinsiva ta leyikulu ku nga ri ta leyitsongo.
mt: The researchers say, however, that the new test is not a replacement for the gold standard, which is a biopsy.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bomo ya movha yi bulukile etihofisinikulu ta maphorisa le Gaziantep, Turkey, tolo nimixo ivi yi dlaya maphorisa mambirhi naswona yi vavise vanhu van’wana vo tlula makumembirhi.
mt: 2 people were killed and 13 injured when a bomb exploded at a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey, on Monday.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Hofisi ya mulawuri yi vule leswaku khumekaye wa lava vavisekeke a ku ri maphorisa.
mt: 2 people were killed in the crash.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Maphorisa ma vule leswaku va sola leswaku vahlohloteri va nyimpi va Daesh (ISIL) hi vona va endleke nhlaselo lowu.
mt: Security forces say they have killed a group of Daesh (ISIL) suicide bombers.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Va kume leswaku Dyambu ri tirha hindlela leyi fanaka ni tinyeleti tin’wana: Swiendlo swa tinyeleti tin’wana hinkwato eka fambiselo swi kumeke swi susumetiwa hi ku vangama, ku rhendzeleka naswona a ku ri hava swin’wana.
mt: 2 people were killed in a car accident: The car was speeding, and the driver was not wearing a seatbelt.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Ku vangama ni ku rhendzeleka swi tirhisa swin’we ku kumisisa nhlayo ya Rossby ya nyeleti, leswi fambisanaka ni nkhuluko wa pulasima.
mt: The discovery of the Rossby waves is the first step in understanding the jet stream, which is responsible for the weather.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Loko nhlayo ya Rossby yi ri yi tsanana, nyeleti yi ta va yi nga tirhi swinene malunghana ni timaginete leti yi ti humesaka.
mt: When the Rossby wave is in phase, the jet stream is relatively straight and smooth. When the Rossby wave is out of phase, the jet stream is wavy and turbulent.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Eka riendzo rakwe, Iwasaki u langutane ni swiphiqo mikarhi yo tala.
mt: In the interview, Iwasaki said he was not aware of the problem until recently.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: U phangeriwile hi vayivi, u hlaseriwile le Tibet hi mbyana leyi a yi ri ni rihuhu, u balekeke vukati le Nepal kutani a ya khomiwa le India.
mt: It was a peaceful protest, a Tibetan monk who was on hunger strike, a protest against China in Nepal, and then was taken to India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Mpimanyeto wa 802.11n wu tirha eka magandlati ya 2.4Ghz na 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates in the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Sweswo swi ta wu pfumelela ku fambisana na 802.11a, 802.11b na 802.11g, ntsena loko xitichikulu xi ri ni tirhadiyo hatimbirhi.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all supported, when the device is connected to a computer with a 802.11g network card.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Rivilo ra 802.11n ri hatlisa ku tlula xitirhisiwa lexo sungula xa mphakelokulu wa 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n is the first standard to break the 600Mbit/s barrier.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duval, loyi a ngheneleke vukati naswona u ni vana vambirhi lava se va kuleke, a nga kalanga a tsakisa Miller, loyi xitori a xi fambisana na yena.
mt: Duval, who has been married and has children, said he was not in a relationship with Miller, who he described as a friend.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Loko a komberiwa ku nyika swibumabumelo, Miller u te, “Mike u vulavula ngopfu hi nkarhi wa nhlangano ...A ndzi nga swi twi kahle leswi a a swi vula.”
mt: When asked about the allegations, Miller said, “Mike was very active in the organization... I don’t know what he was talking about.”
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “Hi ta ringeta ku hunguta nthyakiso wa khaboni dayiokisayidi hi yuniti yin’we ya GDP hi mpimo lowu nyawulaka hi 2020 ku suka eka mpimo wa 2005,” ku vule Hu.
mt: “We expect to see a 10 percent increase in GDP in 2020 compared to 2005,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: A nga wu boxanga mpimo wa ku hunguteka, kambe u vule leswaku ku ta endliwa hi ku landza mpindzulo wa ikhonomi wa China.
mt: The company has not yet commented, but it is believed to be a major blow to China’s aviation industry.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu u khutaze matimba lama endlaka nhluvuko “ku papalata maendlelo ya khale yo rhanga hi ku thyakisa ivi ma basisa endzhaku ka sweswo.”
mt: He said the airport was closed to commercial flights for about 30 minutes while the runway was cleared of debris.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: U engetele leswaku “a va fanelanga, hambiswiritano, va komberiwa ku byarha vutihlamuleri lebyi nga ehenhla ka ku kula ka vona, vutihlamuleri ni vuswikoti.”
mt: “We are saddened, shocked and deeply saddened by the loss of life, the destruction of property and the injuries,”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Iraq Study Group yi andla xiviko xa yona hi 12.00 GMT namuntlha.
mt: 12:00 GMT is the deadline for the Iraq Study Group to release its report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Yi lemukisa leswaku ku hava loyi a nga nyikaka xitiyisiso xa leswaku goza rihi ni rihi ra Iraq sweswi ri ta herisa nkwetlembetano sweswi ri ta yimisa nkwetlembetano wa mpambukwa, madzolonga lama engetelekaka, kumbe mboyamelo wo pfuxa hasahasa.
mt: The report says the new law will allow the government to impose a ban on the import of goods, including food, medicine, and fuel, as well as the export of oil, gas, and electricity.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Xiviko xi rhanga hi xikombelo xo va ni nkanerisano wa mani na mani hi ku simekiwa ka ntwanano eUnited States malunghana ni pholisi ku ya eMiddle East.
mt: The protests are in response to the United States’ support of Israel in the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Xiviko xi xopaxopa swinene xa nkoka swinene xiyenge xin’wana ni xin’wana xa pholisi leyi nga kona ya Varhangeri eka Iragi naswona xi hlohlotela ku cinca ka sweswinyana eka maendlelo.
mt: 2 other aircraft were damaged by the fire, and 2 people were injured.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Xo sungula eka swibumabumelo swa 78 hi leswaku ku fanele ku tekiwa goza lerintshwa ra vudipulomati ku nga si hela lembe ku sirhelela mindzilakana ya Iraq eka minhlaselo yo biha ni ku simeka vuntshwa vuxaka bya vudipulomati ni vaakelani va rona.
mt: 78 countries have agreed to a new resolution to destroy Iraq's weapons of mass destruction by the end of the year.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Murhanga wa sweswi tlhelo Manana wo Sungula wa le Argentina ku nga Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner u tivisile ku nghenela ku hlawuriwa ku va muungameri tolo nimadyambu le La Plata, eka dorobakulu leri nga empfhukeni wa tikhilomitara ta 50 (31 wa timayili) ku suka eBuenos Aires.
mt: 50 km (31 mi) south of Buenos Aires, Argentine President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced the discovery of a new oil field.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Man. Kirchner u tivisile xikongomelo xakwe xa ku yimela ku langiwa ku va muungameri eka Thiyetara ya Argentina, ndhawu yona leyi a yi tirhiseleke ku sungula tsima rakwe ra 2005 ra Sinethara tanihi xirho xa nhlawulo wa xifundzha wa Buenos Aires.
mt: President Kirchner announced the creation of a new ministry of tourism, as part of her government’s efforts to boost the economy of the capital city of Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Nkanerisano wu pfuxiwe hi nkwetlembetano wa mali leyi tirhisiweke ni ku akiwa vuntshwa endzhaku ka ku tlhekeka ka Bubutsa ra Katrina; laha van’wana lava nga ni mavonelo ya vona va endleke mafenya hi ku vula leswaku i "Nxaviselo Lowuntshwa wa Bush le New Orleans."
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina relief efforts were criticized for being slow to respond to the needs of the city of New Orleans.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Ku xopaxopa ka lava lwelaka ntshunxeko ka matshalatshala ya mpfuxeto lama lavaka ku nyika tikontiraka ta mpfuxeto eka lava tekiwaka va le vatirhi va le ndzeni ka Washington.
mt: 2 days ago, a group of students from Washington state were denied access to a school bus because they were wearing hijabs.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Vanhu vo tlula mune wa timiliyoni va ye eRhoma ku va kona enkosini.
mt: 10,000 people marched in Rome to protest the government’s austerity measures.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Nhlayo ya vanhu lava a va ri kona a yi ri yikulu swinene lerova a swi kotekanga leswaku hinkwavo va nghena enkosini le St. Peter's Square.
mt: 1.5 million people are expected to attend the event, with many more watching on television.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Swikirini swo hlaya leswikulu swa thelevhixini swi nghenisiwile etindhawini ku hambanahambana le Rome ku pfumelela vanhu ku hlalela xiendlakalo lexi.
mt: 2,000 people were evacuated from a building in Rome after a fire broke out in a nearby building.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Emadorebenikulu yo tala ya le Italy ni le ka misava hinkwayo, ngopfu-ngopfu le Poland, mahlelelo lama fanaka ma endliwile, laha swi hlaleriweke hi nhlayo leyikulu ya vanhu.
mt: 2010 was a year of natural disasters in Italy and Eastern Europe, including floods, landslides, and a major earthquake in Haiti.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Van’wamatimu va sole tipholisi ta nkarhi lowu hundzeke ta FBI hi ku kongomisa switirhisiwa etimhakeni leti swi olovaka ku tiololoxa, ngopfungopfu timhaka ta mimovha leyi yiviweke, hi xikongomelo xo pfuna eku humeleleni ka xiyenge lexi tiyimeleke.
mt: FBI officials said the investigation is ongoing, and the motive for the shooting is unknown.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Vandla ri sungule ku hakelela goza ra leswi yirisiwaka eka lembeximali ra 2005 ni ku boxa leswaku FBI yi fanele yi nyikela vayimeri va 10 ku veka tihlo eka swifaniso swa lava nga ambalangiki swa lava kuleke.
mt: 2005 legislation requires the FBI to report to Congress on the progress of the program by October 2007.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa u fikelele xikoro xa le henhla xa ntlangu, tirhani ta 70 hi tibolo ta 41 hi ku kora tifo ta 11 ni tisikisi ti-2.
mt: 70-year-old Robin Uthappa scored 41 runs in 11 balls with 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Mutlangi wa le xikarhi, Sachin Tendulkar na Rahul Dravid, va tlange kahle naswona va khomisane ku hlengeleta tirhani ta dzana.
mt: 2003 World Cup winners Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, who retired from international cricket last year, were in fine form and helped their team to victory.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Kambe, endzhaku ka ku humesiwa ka mukaputeni wa le India loyi endleke tirhani ta 36 ntsena ivi ku humesiwa tiwiketi ta 7 ku heta ntlangu.
mt: 36 people were killed and 7 others injured in the crash, according to Indian officials.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Muungameri wa le U.S. George W. Bush u fike le Singapore hi mixo wa Hukuri 16, a sungula hi vuvalangi bya vhiki le Asia.
mt: 16th of June, U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore for a two-day visit to Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: U xewetiwe hi Xandla xa Holobyenkulu le Singapore ku nga Wong Kan Seng ivi ku buriwa hi timhaka takwe ta bindzu ni ta vutherorisi swin’we na Holobyenkulu wa le Singapore ku nga Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: 2008 Singaporean Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong and his wife Ho Ching were infected with the virus and hospitalized.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Endzhaku ka vhiki ra ku lahlekeriwa eka nhlawulo wa le xikarhi, Bush u byele vayingiseri hi ta ku ndlandlamuxiwa ka nxaviselano na Asia.
mt: After a brief period of silence, Bush announced that he would visit Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Holobyenkulu Stephen Harper u pfumerile ku rhumela ‘Nawu wa Moya wo Tenga’ wa hulumendhe eka komiti ya mavandla hinkwawo ku wu kambisisa, emahlweni ko va wu hlayiwa ravumbirhi, endzhaku ka nhlangano wa timinete ta 25 wa Ravumbirhi swin’we na murhangeri wa NDP ku nga Jack Layton eka PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper was forced to cancel a “Spirit of Canada” tour of the country with his cabinet, after being caught in a scandal involving a $90,000 gift to his office from the NDP’s Jack Layton.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton a a komberile ku cinciwa ka papila ra nawu ra mbango ra lava lavaka vulawuri byo va na swipimelo hi nkarhi wa nhlangano siwn’we na PM, a kombela "ku tsariwa vuntshwa hi ku hetiseka " ka nawu wa mbango wa vandla ro fuma hi Swipimelo.
mt: Layton was asked about the possibility of a government shutdown during a press conference with the PM, and urged "to avoid a shutdown" of the government.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Ku sukela loko Hulumendhe Federalii yi sungula ku lawula timali eka xibedlhela xa Mersey le Devonport, Tasmania, hulumendhe ya mfumo na ti-MP tin’wana ta federali va sole xiendlo lexi tanihi ndlela yo kavenyeta nhlawulo lowu nga ta endliwa hi Hukuri.
mt: The Federal Government has announced a $1.5 billion shipbuilding program for the Royal Australian Navy, including a new class of frigates and a new class of submarines.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Kambe Holobyenkulu John Howard u vule leswaku xiendlo xo sirhelela miako yo tirhisiwa ya xibedlhela leswaku yi nga yisiwa ehansi hi hulumendhe ya Tasmania, hi ku nyika mali leyi engetelekeke ya AUD$45 wa timiliyoni.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the government would not be swayed by the report, which he said was based on "speculation" and "guesswork", and would not be rushed into making a decision on the project, which is estimated to cost AUD$45 billion.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Hikuya hi mahungu ya sweswinyana, mipimo ya lwandle yi kombe leswaku tsunami a yi tlhekekile. Hakunene a ku ri ni xiendlakalo xa tsunami leyi rhekhodiweke ekusuhi na Pago Pago na Niue.
mt: The tsunami was caused by a magnitude 8.0 earthquake, which was felt in the capital city of Pago Pago and the island of Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Ku hava ku onhaka kumbe ku vaviseka loku vikiweke le Tonga, kambe gezi ri tsemekile nkarhinyana, leswi hi xiviko swi siveleke valawuri va le Tonga ku amukela ku humesiwa ka xilemukiso xa tsunami hi PTWC.
mt: The Tonga Meteorological Service had initially reported a tsunami, but later cancelled the warning, after the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center reported no tsunami had been generated.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Swikolo wa khumemune le Hawaii leswi nga ekusuhi ni ribuwa swi pfariwile hi Ravunharhu hambileswi swilemukiso swi susiweke.
mt: 1,000 people were evacuated from the Hawaii volcano as it erupted, but the lava flow was contained.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Muungamer wa le U.S. George W. Bush u amukele xitiviso xa kona.
mt: 2004 U.S. presidential candidate George W. Bush was in the area.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Muvulavuleri wa Bush ku nga Gordon Johndroe u vule xihlambanyo xa North Korea "a ku ri pakani yo fikelela ku herisiwa ka matimba ya nyutliwa le ndhawini ya Korea hilaha ku tiyeke."
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said North Korea's "provocative" action was "unacceptable."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Xidzedze xa vukhume lexi thyiweke vito hi nguva ya Bubutsa le Atlantic, Xidzedze xa Subtropical lexi vuriwaka Jerry, xi sungule ku tlhekeka le Lwandle ra Atlantic namuntlha.
mt: Tropical Storm Jerry, which formed in the Atlantic, Subtropical Storm Joyce, and Hurricane Lorenzo are all in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: National Hurricane Center (NHC) yi vula leswaku sweswi Jerry a nga na khombo laha ku tshamaka vanhu.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said the storm was not expected to make landfall.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: U.S. Corps of Engineers yi ringanyeta leswaku tiinci ta 6 ta ku na ka mpfula ku nga tlula mimpimo ya ku onhaka ya nkarhi lowu hundzeke.
mt: 6 inches of rain is expected to cause flooding.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Ninth Ward, laha veke ni ndhambi ya 20 wa tifiti hi nkarhi wa Bubutsa ra Katrina, sweswi yi ni mati lama fikeke exisutini tanihi leswi mpimo wa le kusuhi wu taleke ku tlurisa.
mt: 20 years after Hurricane Katrina devastated the Ninth Ward, the area is still struggling to recover from the damage.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Mati ma halaka eka mpimo wa vuanamo bya 100 wa tifiti.
mt: 100 people were injured in the blast.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Mufambisi wa Commons ku nga Adam Cuerden u phofule ku pfilunganyeka hi lava vekeriweke etlhelo loko a vulavule na Wikinews n’hweti leyi hundzeke.
mt: Commons contributor Adam Cuerden was credited for creating the image used in this article.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Kahlekahle [Wales] u hi hemberile ku sukela eku sunguleni. Xo sungula, hi ku endla onge leswi a swi va swivangelo swa nawu. Xa vumbirhi, hi ku endla onge wa hi yingisa, ku ya eku vekeriweni etlhelo."
mt: "Wales [the team] is a favorite to win. When they start, I will be there to cheer them on. When they play, I will be there to support them."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Ku pfilunganyeka ka rixaka ku vangela matshalatshala ya sweswi yo andlala pholisi malunghana ni lava tameleke ta masangu eka xivandla lexi rhurhelaka timiliyoni ta mahungu lama nga ni layisense ya mani na mani.
mt: 1. The Department of Education is responsible for the administration of the National School Nutrition Programme (NSNP) in all public schools. The NSNP provides meals to all learners in public schools. The Department of Health is responsible for the administration of the School Health Programme (SHP) in all public schools. The SHP provides health services to all learners in public schools.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Ntirho lowu endliweke a wu ri wa mianakanyo hi xitalo, kambe nongonoko a wu tsariwile ku encenyeta leswi xiyiweke hi ta xirimela xa Sagittarius.
mt: The event was visible as a bright flash in the sky, but the meteor was not seen to hit the ground.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Nhlohlotelo wa ntlawa lowu a wu languteriwile wu vangiwe hi matimba ya gandlati exikarhi ka nchumu wa ntima wa xirimela na nchumu wa ntima wa Milky Way.
mt: The galaxy was discovered by a telescope at the National Astronomical Observatory of Japan.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Tanihi leswi n’weti wu nga ni nkokela eka Misava, lowu vangaka magandlati, swi tano ni hi Milky Way yi vangela matimba eka xirimela xa Sagittarius xirimela.
mt: Like the other constellations, it is not a coherent entity, but merely an apparent grouping of stars separated only by the imaginary boundaries of the celestial sphere. It is located in the Milky Way, and contains the star Antares, the brightest star in the constellation.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Van’wasayense va swi kotile ku gimeta hileswaku nchumu wa ntima wu khumba nchumu wun’wana wa ntima hilaha nchumu lowu tolovelekeke wa ntima wu endlaka hakona.
mt: 2 people were killed in the crash, one of them was a pilot.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Mianaknyo leyi yi vula leswaku nchumu wa ntima lowu rhendzeleke xirimela wu kumeka ku lavana ni xirimela hi muxaka wa halo, naswona wu vumbiwa hi swiphemuphemu swo tala leswitsongo.
mt: The accident occurred when the pilot was attempting to land the aircraft, and was struck by lightning.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Swiviko swa le ka thelevhixini swi kombise musi wo basa wu huma eka vumaki.
mt: 2 people were injured in the crash.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Valawuri va ndhawu va lemukisa vaaki lava nga ekusuhi ni vumaki leswaku va nga humeli ehandle, va tima michini yo titimerisa moya nileswaku va nga nwi mati ya le pompini.
mt: The local residents were shocked to see the dead body of a man who was found hanging from a tree, with a note in his hand saying that he was committing suicide because of the drought.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Hikuya hi vuyimeri bya nyutliya bya le Japani, caesium leyi nga ni miseve ya matimba ni iodine swi kumiwile eka vumaki.
mt: 2011 Japanese nuclear accidents released cesium and iodine into the atmosphere.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Valawuri va ehleketa leswaku leswi swi kombisa leswaku switameri leswi nga ni petirolo ya yureniyamu eka xivandla xexo swi nga ha va swi phandlukile ivi swi pfuta.
mt: The investigation is ongoing, but officials say the plane was not carrying any fuel.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dok. Tony Moll u kume Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) endhawini ya KwaZulu-Natal le Afrika Dzonga.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll was diagnosed with Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in KwaZulu-Natal province, South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Eka mbhurisano, u vule leswaku muxaka lowuntshwa a "wu karhata swinene ni ku chavisa hikwalaho ka nhlayo leyikulu ya vanhu lava faka."
mt: In a statement, the company said it was "deeply saddened by the loss of life and the impact on the community."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Vavabyi van’wana va nga ha va kume xitsongwatsongwana lexi exibedlhela, hi ku vona ka Dok. Moll, naswona vambirhi a va ri vatirhi va rihanyo va le xibedlhela.
mt: The victims were not immediately identified, but the doctor, who was a passenger in the car, was killed along with two other people.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
